channel.title: Text Moved From One Tab To Another [PI]
channel.description: I currently have text in my quest tab. I want to move it to my task list tab, because their is a nice image background in their. How would I find out the codes of each line in the task list tab? Someone please help me. PI

item.title: Text Moved From One Tab To Another [PI]
item.dc:creator: @MooningPanda MooningPanda
item.description:
@MooningPanda wrote:

okay this is absurd but i’ll attempt to answer it in the best way i can. Find all the phrases containing the text, and change whatever number/letter/string the tab is called up on to another tab. You’ll have to figure it out from there because it really is a simple fix once you finish learning to program from a relevant perspective instead of just renaming everything…

Read full topic
item.source: Text Moved From One Tab To Another [PI]
